features: MORROCAN HAIR SECRET: Repair dry, damaged, brittle tresses with this extra powerful blend infused with argan oil of Morocco. Intensely hydrate, while this blend infused with silk proteins lock in moisture to give hair the look & feel of silky perfection.

SOFT, SEDUCTIVE, SILKY: This rich blend infused with argan oil of Morocco + silk proteins help repair even the most severely dry, damaged strands, drenching them w/ hydration & helping to strengthen your strands. Discover the Morrocan magic of argan oil

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best! We’re beauty, pure & simple.
Powerful blend of argan oil of Morocco
body.description: Hydrate, repair & renew dry hair with extra strength argan oil of morocco conditioner Free from parabens & sulfated surfactants, this moisturizing conditioner leaves tresses feeling silky & strong

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: we approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability - we approach beauty in our own way. Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Conditioner 13 oz Luxury meets strength. This adaption of an OGX favorite helps deliver superior hydration with a thicker and creamier formula. Made with silk proteins and argan oil, it helps leave your hair lush, soft and luxurious. Intensely nourishing & strengthening conditioner Helps revive and hydrate dry, damaged hair Leaves hair feeling detangled, nourished and silky smooth With Argan Oil of Morocco and Silk Proteins Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Type, Regimen Benefits Bring your hair back to silky perfection. This extra strength conditioning formula blend fortified with silk proteins helps strengthen and soften every strand with moisture. Ingredients Repair dry, damaged, brittle tresses. This extra powerful formula with argan oil of Morocco and silk proteins helps to intensely hydrate and lock in moisture to give hair a second chance at silky perfection. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. - Fine. - Dry. - Curly. - Frizzy. - Course/Textured. - Color-Treated. Regimen For best results, use our entire Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength collection to help with every day moisture. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with one of the treatments to help moisturize and restore shine.

Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Teatree Mint Conditioner OGX 5-in-1 Keratin Smoothing Oil Conditioner OGX Coconut Fine Curls Conditioner Hair Type Coarse or Dry Fine / Flat Damaged / Weakened All Hair Types Frizz-Prone Fine Curls / Wavy Hair Goal *Up to 2x Softer & 2x Stronger + Shine *Fuller-Looking, Healthier-Looking Hair *Up to 82% Less Breakage in one use *Remove Scalp Buildup Without Stripping Tame Frizz, Humidity Protection, Strengthen + Shine *Up to 5x Stronger Key Ingredient Argan Oil + Silk Proteins Biotin + Collagen + Bamboo Fiber Extract Coconut Oil + Vanilla Bean Extract + Essence of Tiare Teatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch HazelTeatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch Hazel Keratin Protein + Argan Oil + Ceramides Coconut Water + Flaxseed Scent Citrus with green floral & woody notes Bergamot, Jasmine + Vanilla Coconut Milk, Warm Vanilla + Tangerine Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Golden Amber, Tropical Orange + Madagascar Vanilla Coconut, Tangerine + Warm Vanilla Contains Sulfates? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grey hair loves it
reviews.reviewText: Finally a product that softens my bushy grey hair. Scent is nice too. My only concern is the shape of bottle. My old arthritic hands have some trouble grasping and squeezing the rotund shape. Product is thick so squeezing it out takes some effort. Hope geriatric friendly packaging will be considered in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not like Most
reviews.reviewText: I really like this conditioner. It’s not like a lot I’ve used in the past. It’s a very heavy, thick conditioner, almost like pudding in consistency, so you can really control where you want to put it. I put a large blob of it in my hands and starting about mid-ear work it in going down to the ends. My hair is waist length and as long as I do it like this and don’t put a lot on the roots, my hair stays clean and shiny for several days. It also makes my hair soft to the touch, but not too soft to style. A lot of conditioners I’ve tried in the past just leave my hair limp like spaghetti, but not this one. My hair looks and feels so much better since I’ve started using this along with the corresponding shampoo. I’m really pleased with the results.
